confirmation-message:
Your transaction has been submitted!
It will show up in your history after mining a few blocks.

receive.tooltip-emoji-id-text: This is your Emoji ID. It can be used as an alternative to your regular txn address to send and receive XTM.

keychain.warning:
Keychain access is required for this operation.
Please try again and select “allow”.

pin.creation-subtitle:
Set a secure PIN code to protect your wallet on this device.
Your PIN stays private—it’s never stored or shared with Tari Universe.
pin.creation-subtitle-confirm: Enter your PIN again to confirm it is correct.
pin.error-match: That’s not quite right. Try again or create a new PIN.
pin.explainer: If you forget this PIN, the only way to regain access to your wallet is by restoring it from your seed phrase.

reminder.description: You haven't secured your wallet yet. Backing up your seed phrase keeps your tokens safe and ensures only you can access them.\nLet's do it now—it'll only take a moment
reminder.title: Protect your Tari

send.completed-text: Your transfer submission is now complete and will be broadcast.
send.processing-text: Your transfer is processing. This can take a few minutes.
send.processing-title: Your XTM is on the way!

swap.buy-tari-subtitle: Buy Tari from any of these supported exchanges.
swap.no-other-tokens-available: No other tokens available to select.
swap.please-confirm-approval-in-wallet: Please confirm approval in your wallet
swap.scan-qr-code: Scan the QR code to connect your wallet on your phone
swap.sign-message: Sign the message on your mobile device
swap.sign-message-text: Approve this transaction using Metamask on your mobile device. Once it has been signed, your transaction will be processed.
swap.transaction-could-not-be-completed: The transaction could not be completed
swap.you-will-receive: You will receive {{symbol}} in (Tari wallet address)
swap.your-purchase-is-processing: Your purchase is processing. This can take a few minutes.
swap.your-xtm-is-on-the-way: Your XTM is on the way!

sync-message.tooltip-description: Your node is still syncing, so your balance isn't visible yet.
sync-message.tooltip-description-mining: Your node is still syncing, so your balance isn't visible yet. But don't worry, you're actively mining and earning XTM.
sync-message.top-line: You are now mining Tari XTM
